title: Top up what's needed for champ skin
body:
Hi Team,

Would be nice to have the option of buying a skin with what's left in RP balance and just topping up enough points to buy the skin.

So if I have 450RP and want a skin that's 520RP would be nice to be able to buy the skin and just pay for the extra 70RP without having to buy 520RP then be stuck with more leftover RP in a never ending cycle.

I note if buying RP bundles you get bonus RP with it, perhaps if you buy top-up RP you just don't get any bonus, that way it's more expensive to use this option so there is still the incentive to buy larger volumes of RP. Having a top-up purchase option may also increase impulse buying for you guys, esp now that you can buy skins from the match making screen.

I get that $5 for 520RP is not budget breaking, but would be nice to be able to clean up RP and be able to put it toward a skin rather than buying something that has no value to me in the game.

Cheers.

replies.body: It is a deliberate marketing strat bro. Use a secondary currency that is scaled diff to make it a little confusing and divorced from "real spending" and then make the amounts you buy odd to the cost of anything so people always have left overs and they keep topping up more to use the left over but then are left with more leftovers that sit there tempting them to top up again.
